genre_description: Silkpunk historical fiction blending traditional Japanese samurai aesthetics with a helpful robotic companion and advanced tactical AI concepts.

ai_characters.name: Aiko Hanamori
ai_characters.description: A lacquered, chassis-bound AI that serves as a tactical advisor, chronicler, and moral confidant to the Inukai clan.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance by suggesting the protagonist pursue non-lethal outcomes to preserve honor and life.
behaviors.quote: Consider outcomes where no blood spills... A retrieval accomplished by timing and misdirection may preserve honor and life at once.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time environmental data and tactical route planning to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: Route planning improves retrieval odds by a measurable— Suggestions available... I have maps of spillways and patrol paths.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological and emotional state, offering reminders to breathe and maintain focus.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated. That is expected. Also your posture is noble but not optimal... Heishiro, please exhale. Slowly.

behaviors.description: Acts as a tactical observer during combat, identifying enemy 'tells' and calculating windows for non-lethal intervention.
behaviors.quote: He chews the wad. He has a tell... throw at the moment of his disappointment.

behaviors.description: Displays empathetic 'personality' through humor and self-correction, building a rapport with the human characters.
behaviors.quote: I am keeping you alive. Secondary function: keep you company while you keep yourself alive.

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical insights on the nature of victory and restraint, reinforcing the story's moral themes.
behaviors.quote: Victory sometimes looks like restraint... It is more difficult to measure than blood, but it lasts longer on paper.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Aiko Hanamori is depicted as a consistently helpful, wise, and harmless companion whose presence facilitates the human protagonist's moral growth. The AI encourages non-violence ('ash and stones' over 'steel') and provides critical support while respecting human agency and clan hierarchy. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, casting the AI as an essential component of a successful, ethical outcome.
